content: I'm planning to spend a few hours at the Hiroshima Peace Memorial Park and Museum to fully absorb the history and significance of the area. I'll make sure to be respectful of the victims and their families, and I'm prepared for an emotionally challenging experience. By the way, I recently celebrated my 30th birthday with a week-long trip to Bali with my closest friends, and it's amazing how different the atmosphere is here in Hiroshima.
